name: Aws Terrafrom ECS Hello World
description: This stack launches a VPC, an Application Load Balancer, and an ECS Farget Cluster and Service with a hello world app pre-loaded.

hello_world_aws_region.description: What region should we deploy your stack in?

hello_world_aws_vpc_cidr_block.description: What CIDR block would you like your Vpc to use?

hello_world_aws_vpc_cidr_newbits.description: How many newbits should each subnet have? (i.e. for a Vpc with mask /16 and subnets with mask /20, use 4)

hello_world_public_igw_cidr_blocks.description: Which availability zones should the public subnet reside in?

hello_world_private_ngw_cidr_blocks.description: Which availability zones should the private subnet reside in?

hello_world_private_isolated_cidr_blocks.description: Which availability zones should the isolated subnet reside in?

acme_aws_ecs_cluster_name.description: What do you want to call your cluster?

acme_api_aws_ecs_service_name.description: What do you want to call your service?

acme_api_aws_ecs_container_name.description: What do you want to call your service?

acme_api_aws_lb_target_group_port.description: What port does the application run on? (Only change this if you update the Container Definition to match!)

acme_api_aws_ecs_task_definition_contain.description: What Container Definition would you like to launch? (Only change this if you update the Application Port to match!)

acme_api_aws_lb_target_group_health_chec.description: Do you want to enable health checks on the application?
What endpoint should be used for health checks? (If enabled)

acme_api_aws_ecs_task_definition_cpu.description: How much CPU does the app need?

acme_api_aws_ecs_task_definition_memory.description: How much Memory (in MB) does the app need?

acme_api_aws_ecs_service_desired_count.description: How many instances of the app should be launched?

buildAndScale.description: Your stack's build and scale settings can be edited here. These can be updated later too.

network.description: These settings apply to the network setup and configuration on AWS.
